text: @CNN Prime Minister Trudeau keep it up! Justin needs to keep the Canadian border CLOSED! Trump is not dealing with Covid 19 seriously at all! In America the coronavirus is out of control! I applaud the Prime Minister for rejecting Trump invitation to the White House too!!
